title: 246C.10 FORENSIC SERVICES.
text:
(a) The executive board shall create and maintain forensic services programs.
(b) The executive board must provide forensic services in coordination with counties and other vendors.
(c) Forensic services must include specialized inpatient programs at secure treatment facilities, consultive services, aftercare services, community-based services and programs, transition services, nursing home services, or other services consistent with the mission of Direct Care and Treatment.
(d) The executive board may adopt rules to carry out the provision of this section and to govern the operation of the services and programs under the direct administrative authority of the executive board.
